Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ecPis-2 (piscidins, natural AMPs; fish, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 85.7% similarity toEpinecidin-1. molecular formula:  C115H170N30O21S1; Mol Wt 2340.871; GRAVY= 1.05; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide: -4.22  kcal/mol.Activity: Active against E. coli, S. aureus, V. parahaemolyticus, and P. pastoris (MIC 1.25-5 uM).  Upregulated after V. Parahaemolyticus challenge.
Literature Information.Author: Zhuang ZR, Yang XD, Huang XZ, Gu HX, Wei HY, He YJ, Deng L.2017
Literature Information.Title: Three new piscidins from orange-spotted grouper (Epinephelus coioides): Phylogeny, expression and functional characterization.
